: : Kup : :
Kup: Your being here wouldn't have something to do with a recently revived and newly evil Autobot Commander, would it?


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:AzureBlade bowed deeply and followed Kup inside.

AzureBlade: I believe you understand the meaning of my presence here,
do you not? I will have to brief you on the situation away from here too.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Kup : :
> Kup came to the entrence to the Maximal base, opening the main doors.
> 
> Kup: Hello AzureBlade. I am Kup. Welcome to the Maximal base. Please
come in.
> 
> Kup motions for the ice dragon bot to enter the base.
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:The ice dragon flew over wide forests
and finally landed where Kup had
> told him.
> 
> It was a wreck. More precisely, a downed Maximal ship that had
> crash-landed here, at the fringe of a forest.
> 
> He decided to transform. He kept his two plasma blades sheathed and
> opened his comm.
> 
> AzureBlade: Master Kup, this is AzureBlade. I have arrived at your base.
> 
> 
> Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service. 
> 
> 
> 
> ---------------------------------
